* Single Right Click
** Use touchscreen to open directory folder with single tap
** Use touchscreen to naviagate web links with single tap
* Double Right Click
** Use touchscreen to launch application with double tap
* Single Left Click
** Use touchscreen to open contextual menu with tap and hold
* Drag and Drop
** Move folder or icon using touchpad with tap, hold, and drag
